what: Clinical Trial Style Data Readout Listings
title: Clinical Trial Style Data Readout Listings
text: Value formatting ASCII rendering infrastructure tables listings.

title: Methods for `listing_df` objects — listing_methods
text: See core documentation formatters descriptions functions.

title: Methods for `listing_df` objects — listing_methods
code: # S3 method for listing_df print(x, ...)  # S4 method for listing_df make_row_df(   tt,   colwidths = NULL,   visible_only = TRUE,   rownum = 0,   indent = 0L,   path = character(),   incontent = FALSE,   repr_ext = 0L,   repr_inds = integer(),   sibpos = NA_integer_,   nsibs = NA_integer_ )  # S4 method for listing_df [(x, i, j, drop = FALSE)  # S4 method for listing_df main_title(obj)  # S4 method for listing_df subtitles(obj)  # S4 method for listing_df main_footer(obj)  # S4 method for listing_df prov_footer(obj)  # S4 method for listing_df main_title(obj) <- value  # S4 method for listing_df subtitles(obj) <- value  # S4 method for listing_df main_footer(obj) <- value  # S4 method for listing_df prov_footer(obj) <- value  paginate_listing(   lsting,   lpp = 15,   cpp = NULL,   min_siblings = 2,   nosplitin = character(),   colwidths = NULL,   verbose = FALSE )

title: Methods for `listing_df` objects — listing_methods
text: x listing_df. listing. ... dots. Unused tt . Object representing table-like object summarized. colwidths numeric. Print  widths  columns,  manually set/previously known. visible_only logical(1). visible aspects table structure reflected summary. Defaults TRUE. May supported methods. rownum numeric(1). Internal detail set manually. indent integer(1). Internal detail set manually. path character.  Path   (sub)table  represented  tt. Defaults character() incontent logical(1). Internal detail set manually. repr_ext integer(1). Internal detail set manually. repr_inds integer. Internal detail set manually. sibpos integer(1). Internal detail set manually. nsibs integer(1). Internal detail set manually. . Passed base `[` methods. j . Passed base `[` methods. drop matrices arrays.  TRUE result     coerced lowest possible dimension (see examples).      works extracting elements, replacement.  See     drop details. obj object. value typically array-like R object similar class     x. lsting listing_df. listing paginate. lpp numeric(1). Number row lines (counting titles footers) per page. cpp numeric(1). Number columns per page min_siblings numeric. Minimum sibling rows must appear either side pagination row mid-subtable split valid. Defaults 2. nosplitin character. List names sub-tables page-breaks allowed, regardless considerations. Defaults none. verbose logical(1). additional informative messages search pagination breaks shown. Defaults FALSE.

what: Create a Listing from a data.frame or tibble — as_listing
title: Create a Listing from a data.frame or tibble — as_listing
Create a Listing from a data.frame or tibble — as_listing
code: as_listing(   df,   cols = key_cols,   key_cols = names(df)[1],   main_title = NULL,   subtitles = NULL,   main_footer = NULL,   prov_footer = NULL )  as_keycol(vec)  is_keycol(vec)  get_keycols(df)  # S4 method for listing_df matrix_form(obj, indent_rownames = FALSE)  listing_dispcols(df)  add_listing_dispcol(df, new)  listing_dispcols(df) <- value  add_listing_col(df, name, fun = NULL, format = NULL)

title: Create a Listing from a data.frame or tibble — as_listing
text: df listing_df. listing modify. cols character. Names columns (including limited key columns) displayed listing rendered. key_cols character. Names columns treated *key columns* rendering listing. main_title character(1) NULL. main title listing, `NULL` (default). Must length 1 non-NULL. subtitles character NULL. vector subtitle(s) listing, NULL (default). main_footer character NULL. vector main footer lines listing, `NULL` (default). prov_footer character NULL. vector provenance strings listing, `NULL` (default). vec . column vector `listing_df` obj . Object transformed ready--render form (MatrixPrintForm object) indent_rownames logical(1), TRUE column row names `strings` matrix indented row names (strings pre-fixed) new character. Names columns added set display columns. value character. New value. name character(1). Name existing new column displayed listing rendered fun function NULL. function accepts df returns vector new column, added df name, NULL marking existing column listing column format FormatSpec. format specification (format string, function, sprintf format) use displaying column rendering.

title: Create a Listing from a data.frame or tibble — as_listing
text: `listing_df` object, sorted key columns. `df`, `name` created (necessary) marked display rendering.

title: Create a Listing from a data.frame or tibble — as_listing
code: dat <- ex_adae  lsting <- as_listing(dat[1:25,], key_cols = c("USUBJID", "AESOC")) %>%     add_listing_col("AETOXGR") %>%     add_listing_col("BMRKR1", format = "xx.x") %>%     add_listing_col("AESER / AREL", fun = function(df) paste(df$AESER, df$AREL, sep = " / ")) #> sorting incoming data by key columns   mat <- matrix_form(lsting)  cat(toString(mat)) #> Unique Subject Identifier   Primary System Organ Class   Analysis Toxicity Grade   Continous Level Biomarker 1   AESER / AREL #> ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— #> AB12345-BRA-1-id-134        cl A                                    2 Y / N     #> AB12345-BRA-1-id-236        cl B                                    5                          7.7                  N / Y     #> AB12345-BRA-1-id-265        cl C                                    2                         10.3                  N / Y     #>                                                                     4 N / Y     #>                             cl D                                    5                          2.3                  Y / N

title: rlistings 0.1.1
text: add title, subtitle, (main prov) footer support now depends dplyr instea dof magrittr hopefully avoid var_labels droppage issues paginate_listing now supports pagination directions

title: rlistings 0.1.0
text: Initial experimental rlistings API. Everything subject change.
